site_name: Electricity Sub Station East of Block A Giffon Studios
description:

T21 Ash - Fell.(T17)

T24 Cherry - Fell - Dead (T2)

T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T16, T22, T25 Pruned to allow up to 1.5m clearance around lamp columns
T1-T28 Crown lift up to 3m over paths, 5m over roads
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This consent is valid for a period of two years and does not authorise any works carried out beyond that period.
Reason: In accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Tree Preservation) (England) Regulations 2012.

Condition : 2 - A 2m high replacement tree of the same species, is to be planted in the same location, in the first available planting season following the removal of the tree hereby permitted, unless a variation to this is agreed in writing with the local planning authority.  Confirmation when planting has taken place should be sent to trees@wandsworth.gov.uk 
Reason: To preserve the visual amenity of the area in accordance with Planning Practice Guidance on Tree Preservation Orders and to safeguard the appearance of the locality, in accordance with Council policy DMO5 of the Development Management Policies Document (adopted March 2016).
